channel.title: Command Help

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

Well i added theese Commands to my server, But what happens is when i type it like

::sell Dharoks axe

It only Shows up as

[PlayerName]: is SELLING: roks axe

How could i fix this?

The code for sell looks like this.

 if (command.startsWith("sell") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > -1) {
     String text = command.substring(8);
        yell(playerName+" is [SELLING] the item: "+ Character.toUpperCasetext.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}

:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2009, 12:17:16 am[/size][hr]Thanks for the help guys

Read full topic
